articles.title: Microsoft's Surface ANC headphones are on sale for $438 less than Apple AirPods Max - CNET
articles.description: Originally $350, Microsoft's fancy headphones can be yours right now for $111. That's a historic low. Plus: Turn an old laptop into a new Chromebook -- for free.
articles.content:
The Surface Headphones come in a non-ridiculous case that didn't inspire countless memes. These are the black variety; the deal is for the gray ones.
David Carnoy/CNET
